lemma ltl_convert_correct: assumes "ltl_convert \<phi> = (APs, \<phi>\<^sub>i)" shows "atoms_ltlc \<phi> = set (IArray.list_of APs)" (is "?P1") and "atoms_ltlc \<phi>\<^sub>i = {..<IArray.length APs}" (is "?P2") and "\<phi>\<^sub>i = map_ltlc (the \<circ> idx (IArray.list_of APs)) \<phi>" (is "?P3") and "distinct (IArray.list_of APs)"
